document.full_text: pimco's bill gross, the manager of the world's largest bond fund, said on monday it was a "misconception" the firm was short u.s. treasuries, saying they never actually bet against u.s. treasuries.
document.title: pimco's gross: "never" short u.s. treasuries: report
lines_and_colors: pimco's bill gross, the manager of the world's largest bond fund, said on monday it was a "misconception" the firm was short u.s. treasuries, saying they never actually bet against u.s. treasuries.
